description: A TypeScript MCP server for Home Assistant, enabling programmatic management of entities, automations, services, and dashboards. Designed for extensibility. Includes Docker support and Vitest-based tests for easy deployment and reliability.

tools.name: get-rest-automation-trace
tools.title: Get automation trace by rest_id and run_id
tools.description: Fetches the trace for a specific automation run using its REST id and run id.

tools.name: list-rest-automation-traces
tools.title: List automation traces by rest_id
tools.description: List all traces for a specific automation using its REST id.

tools.name: list-automations
tools.title: List all automations
tools.description: List all automations

items.description: Home Assistant automation entity with state, attributes including automation ID, mode, and execution details

tools.name: delete-automation
tools.title: Delete an automation
tools.description: Delete an automation by id

tools.name: get-automation-by-entity-id
tools.title: Get automation by entity_id
tools.description: Find an automation entity using its entity_id (e.g. automation.my_automation).

automation.description: Home Assistant automation entity with state, attributes including automation ID, mode, and execution details

tools.name: get-rest-automation-by-entity-id
tools.title: Get REST automation by entity_id
tools.description: Get an automation's REST definition using its entity_id (e.g. automation.my_automation).

automation.description: Home Assistant automation configuration object with ID, alias, description, triggers, conditions, actions, and execution mode

tools.name: update-automation-by-entity-id
tools.title: Update automation by entity_id
tools.description: Update an automation using its entity_id (e.g. automation.my_automation).

automation.description: Home Assistant automation configuration object with ID, alias, description, triggers, conditions, actions, and execution mode

tools.name: get-automation-by-rest-id
tools.title: Get automation by rest_id
tools.description: Find an automation entity using its REST API id (rest_id, not entity_id).

automation.description: Home Assistant automation entity with state, attributes including automation ID, mode, and execution details

tools.name: get-rest-automation-by-rest-id
tools.title: Get REST automation by rest_id
tools.description: Get an automation's REST definition using its rest_id (REST API id, not entity_id).

automation.description: Home Assistant automation configuration object with ID, alias, description, triggers, conditions, actions, and execution mode

tools.name: update-rest-automation-by-rest-id
tools.title: Update REST automation by rest_id
tools.description: Update an automation using its rest_id (REST API id, not entity_id).

automation.description: Home Assistant automation configuration object with ID, alias, description, triggers, conditions, actions, and execution mode

tools.name: delete-rest-automation-by-rest-id
tools.title: Delete REST automation by rest_id
tools.description: Delete an automation using its rest_id (REST API id, not entity_id).

tools.name: create-rest-automation
tools.title: Create REST automation
tools.description: Create a new automation via the Home Assistant REST API. Returns the new rest_id.

automation.description: Home Assistant automation creation object without ID, used when creating new automations

tools.name: list-device-automation-triggers
tools.title: List device automation triggers
tools.description: List all triggers for a specific device's automations.

tools.name: get-status
tools.title: Get Home Assistant connection status
tools.description: Get Home Assistant connection status

tools.name: validate-config
tools.title: Validate triggers, conditions and actions for any automation change
tools.description: Validate triggers, conditions and actions configurations as if part of an automation. Any changes to automation should be checked with this tool

config.description: Validation configuration for Home Assistant automation triggers, conditions, and actions

tools.name: call-service
tools.title: Call a Home Assistant service
tools.description: Call a Home Assistant service

tools.name: get-manifest
tools.title: Get Home Assistant integration manifest
tools.description: Get the manifest of a Home Assistant integration

tools.name: get-entity-registry-by-entity-id
tools.title: Get entity registry by entity_id
tools.description: Get registry info for a specific entity_id

tools.name: get-device-id-by-entity-id
tools.title: Get device_id by entity_id
tools.description: Get the device_id for a given entity_id

tools.name: get-config-entry-id-by-entity-id
tools.title: Get config_entry_id by entity_id
tools.description: Get the config_entry_id for a given entity_id, useful for templated sensors and other config entry flows alike

configEntryId.description: Config entry ID for the entity

tools.name: update-device-registry
tools.title: Update device registry
tools.description: Update the device registry for a specific device_id

area_id.description: Area ID to assign the device to

device_config.description: Any field device configuration to update

tools.name: create-config-entry-flow
tools.title: Create config entry flow with a handler helpers
tools.description: Create a new config entry in the Home Assistant entity registry for a new config entry (new templated helpers for ex)

handler.description: The handler for the config entry flow

tools.name: continue-config-entry-flow
tools.title: Continue config entry flow
tools.description: Continue an existing config entry flow with a next step Id

flow_id.description: The ID of the config entry flow to continue

next_step_id.description: The ID of the next step to execute

tools.name: finish-config-entry-flow
tools.title: Finish config entry flow
tools.description: Finish an existing config entry flow

flow_id.description: The ID of the config entry flow to finish

tools.name: create-config-entry-options-flow
tools.title: Create config entry options flow for a config entry id
tools.description: Create a new config entry options flow for a specific config entry (already existing config entry, templated helpers for ex)

config_entry_id.description: The ID of the config entry to create options flow for

tools.name: update-config-entry-options-flow
tools.title: Update config entry options flow
tools.description: Update an existing config entry options flow

flow_id.description: The ID of the config entry flow to update

tools.name: list-config-entry-flows-helpers
tools.title: List helpers types
tools.description: List available config entry flow handlers for helpers

tools.name: list-scripts
tools.title: List all scripts
tools.description: List all scripts in Home Assistant, friendly_name = alias

tools.name: get-rest-script-by-entity-id
tools.title: Get a script by entity_id
tools.description: Get the details of a specific script by its entity_id

entityId.description: Entity ID of the script, e.g. 'my_script'

tools.name: get-rest-script-by-alias
tools.title: Get a script by alias
tools.description: Get the details of a specific script by its alias, not script.entity_id

alias.description: Alias of the script, e.g. 'My Script' not 'script.script_entity_id'

tools.name: upsertScriptRest-rest-script-by-alias
tools.title: Create or Update a script by alias
tools.description: Create or Update the details of a specific script by its alias

data.description: The script configuration data to create/update

alias.description: alias of the script, e.g. 'My Script'

tools.name: delete-rest-script-by-alias
tools.title: Delete a script by alias
tools.description: Delete a specific script by its alias

alias.description: Alias of the script, e.g. 'My Script'

tools.name: list-entities-by-prefix
tools.title: List all entities by prefix
tools.description: List all Home Assistant entities by prefix

tools.name: list-entities-by-regex
tools.title: List all entities by regex
tools.description: List all Home Assistant entities matching a regex pattern

flags.description: Regex flags, e.g. 'i' for ignore case

pattern.description: Regex pattern for entity IDs, e.g. '^sensor\.'

tools.name: get-entity-state
tools.title: Get state of a specific entity
tools.description: Get state of a specific entity_id

state.description: Home Assistant entity state object with entity ID, state value, attributes, and context information

tools.name: get-entity-domain
tools.title: Get domain of a specific entity
tools.description: Get domain of a specific entity_id

tools.name: search-related
tools.title: Search related entities
tools.description: Search for entities related to a specific item_type (like 'area') and entity_id (like 'studio')

itemId.description: ID of the item, e.g. 'sensor.temperature' or 'area.living_room'

tools.name: list-area
tools.title: List all areas
tools.description: List all Home Assistant areas

tools.name: get-lovelace-config
tools.title: Get Lovelace Config
tools.description: Fetch Lovelace dashboard config by url_path. The URL must contain a dash ('-') and must not contain spaces or special characters, except '_' and '-'

url_path.description: The URL path of the Lovelace dashboard config to fetch, e.g., 'default-view' or 'dashboard-id'. The URL must contain a dash ('-') and must not contain spaces or special characters, except '_' and '-'

tools.name: update-lovelace-config
tools.title: Update Lovelace Config
tools.description: Update Lovelace dashboard config by url_path.

url_path.description: The URL path of the Lovelace dashboard config to update

tools.name: list-lovelace-dashboards
tools.title: List Lovelace Dashboards
tools.description: List all Lovelace dashboards.

tools.name: create-lovelace-dashboard
tools.title: Create Lovelace Dashboard
tools.description: Create a new Lovelace dashboard.

url_path.description: The URL must contain a dash ('-') and must not contain spaces or special characters, except '_' and '-'

tools.name: delete-lovelace-dashboard
tools.title: Delete Lovelace Dashboard
tools.description: Delete a Lovelace dashboard by dashboard_id.

tools.name: get-lovelace-resources
tools.title: Get Lovelace Resources
tools.description: Fetch Lovelace resources.

anyOf.description: Enable debug mode for verbose logging

debugMode.description: Enable debug mode for verbose logging

anyOf.description: Limit the number of resources to convert, -1 for no limit

LIMIT_RESOURCES.description: Limit the number of resources to convert, -1 for no limit
